name: Neon Serpent Dome
description: A dazzling, multi-tiered arena in Neo-Tokyo, famous for its holographic displays and an electrifying atmosphere.

name: The Steel Citadel
description: A massive, industrial-themed arena in the heart of Pittsburgh. Home to the most technically sound fans in the world.

name: Oda Clan Fortress
description: A high-tech, yakuza-controlled arena in the Osaka Cyber-District. The crowd is intensely loyal to the Oda legacy.

name: The Frozen Peak
description: A state-of-the-art cryo-arena in Winnipeg. Known for its 'chilly' reception to outsiders and explosive atmosphere.

name: Lion's Roar Sanctuary
description: A majestic arena built along the Zambezi River, combining ancient aesthetics with 23rd-century energy technology.

name: The Epic of Uruk
description: A breathtaking reconstruction of the ancient Mesopotamian city, serving as a massive open-air wrestling complex.

name: Frost-Bite Octagon
description: A brutal, sub-zero fighting cage in the Siberian Outpost. Only the most battle-hardened survive here.

name: Jaguar's Sun-Stone Plaza
description: A massive megaplex in Mexico City, celebrating the rich history of Lucha Libre with cutting-edge holographic masks.

name: The Palace of Slam
description: The personal playground of Johnny All Time. It's more of a high-end nightclub and parkour course than a traditional arena.

name: Royal Bulldog Hall
description: A prestigious arena in Neo-London, preserving the grit and glory of British wrestling tradition.

name: Grand Palace Gardens
description: An elegant arena floating above Neo-Paris, where matches are treated as a high-society art form.

name: Zero-G Octagon
description: A cutting-edge arena on Lunar Colony Alpha, where gravity projectors can be manipulated for unique match physics.

name: Canopy Combat Cage
description: A spectacular cage arena suspended high above the Amazon jungle floor, integrated into the massive Bio-Trees.

name: Aqua Colosseum
description: An exquisite underwater arena in Atlantis Reborn, with transparent domes offering views of marine life.
